root.name: Final Fantasy Origins
root.description: OverviewFinal Fantasy Origins is an enhanced compilation of the Wonder Swan Color remakes of Final Fantasy and Final Fantasy II for the Sony PlayStation. The western release of the compilation in North America and Europe marked the first time that Final Fantasy II was officially made available in those markets.The compilation also includes the following for each game:New theme songsNew prerendered introductionsArt galleriesA detailed bestiary of all of the enemies for both games
